item.title: Hello, World!
item.description:
Header image by Negative Space

Hi, I am glad you found your way here! Come in, have a look.

I finally managed to set up a personal homepage - and how easy it was! Huge thanks to the developers of the R package {blogdown} Yihui Xie, Amber Thomas and Alison Presmanes Hill and the open-source Hugo framework. Much thanks also to Huabing Zhao for sharing his “CleanWhite” theme!
